name: DeleteTaskTemplate
description:
Delete a specific task template by its ID.

Use this tool to delete an existing task template in Asana by providing its unique GID. It's useful for removing templates that are no longer needed.

parameters.name: task_template_id
parameters.description: Globally unique identifier for the task template to be deleted.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier for the task template.

parameters.name: enable_pretty_output
parameters.description: Set to True for a pretty, formatted JSON response. This is useful for debugging but may increase response time and size.

value_schema.description:
Provides “pretty” output.
Provides the response in a “pretty” format. In the case of JSON this means doing proper line breaking and indentation to make it readable. This will take extra time and increase the response size so it is advisable only to use this during debugging.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the asana API.

parameters.description:

parameters.name: task_template_gid
parameters.description: Globally unique identifier for the task template.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier for the task template.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
